name: Kwaito
description: Emerged from South Africa in the early 1990s, taking influence from Disco and Hip Hop.

children.name: Bacardi
children.description: Bacardi is a type of House music from South Africa derived from Kwaito, delivering upbeat, danceable rhythms with lively snares and hi-hats.
